name: The Forgotten Tomb
description: You play as a tomb raider trapped in a tomb tied to a boulder lingering above, you must traverse through the forgotten tomb, collecting all keys along the way. But watch out, there's spike traps to kill you and holes in the roof for the rock to fall through to crush you. To view all those holes previously mentioned hold shift, but while viewing the upper floor, your raider down below is vulnerable and blind.
